item.title: Got Inbox invite from Genkiman Dan!!
item.description: ##11:12 Friday 31 October 2014 JST## Hooray! I apparently have some invitations to hand out, so email me if you want one. ##11:30## In the first 3 minutes of using it (from my desktop), I archived ~200 messages quite easily. Thanks you Inbox team!
